name: Slaughter the Strong
oracle_text: Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.
flavor_text:
"Cut the beasts out from under them and their strength is nothing."
—Vona of Iedo, Butcher of Magan

name: Skywhaler's Shot
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or greater. Scry 1.
flavor_text: In the moment of truth, it is as though time stands still, and the whale waits, suspended in the sky.

name: Soul of Eternity
oracle_text:
Soul of Eternity's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.
Encore {7}{W}{W} ({7}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

name: Slith Ascendant
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Slith Ascendant deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: Instinctively drawn to the light of its "mother-sun," each slith follows that sun's path around Mirrodin.

name: Triumphant Reckoning
oracle_text: Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: In a flash of a light and burst of aether, despair turned to hope and defeat turned to victory.

name: Squad Captain
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Squad Captain enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control.
flavor_text: The strength of the one is the strength of the many.

name: Trusty Packbeast
oracle_text: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back."
—Hewen Frit, merchant

name: Aven Surveyor
oracle_text:
Flying
When Aven Surveyor enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Surveyor.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Aqueous Form
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Azure Fleet Admiral
oracle_text:
When Azure Fleet Admiral enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Azure Fleet Admiral can't be blocked by creatures the monarch controls.
flavor_text:
"Your concern for my safety is touching, but as long as your gunners remain reliably erratic, I see no reason to change course."
—Admiral Yelise, to Commodore Axurik

name: Body of Knowledge
oracle_text:
Body of Knowledge's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever Body of Knowledge is dealt damage, draw that many cards.

name: Prosperous Pirates
oracle_text: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.

name: Daring Saboteur
oracle_text:
{2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: "They'll never see me coming."

name: Scrapdiver Serpent
oracle_text: Scrapdiver Serpent can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.
flavor_text: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.

name: Scholar of Stars
oracle_text: When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.
flavor_text: "The path of the stars is as reliable as the instruments that measure them."

name: Sailor of Means
oracle_text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.

name: Skilled Animator
oracle_text: When Skilled Animator enters the battlefield, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 for as long as Skilled Animator remains on the battlefield.

name: Skaab Goliath
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile two creature cards from your graveyard.
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: Three heads are better than one.

name: Thirst for Knowledge
oracle_text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
flavor_text: "To truly know something, you must become it. The trick is to not lose yourself in the process."

name: Strategic Planning
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Bolas remade this place in his image. He has the advantage here. We must approach carefully."
—Jace Beleren

name: Spontaneous Mutation
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

name: Trove Tracker
oracle_text:
When Trove Tracker dies, draw a card.
Encore {5}{U}{U} ({5}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

name: Corpse Churn
oracle_text: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"The distraction of your life has ended. Now your service begins."
—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog

name: Bladebrand
oracle_text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "One knife, two knives, three knives, four—which will drop you to the floor?"

name: Elvish Doomsayer
oracle_text: When Elvish Doomsayer dies, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: "From a tiny doubt, the greatest fears grow and flourish. May the weeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

name: Dhund Operative
oracle_text: As long as you control an artifact, Dhund Operative gets +1/+0 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Baral's spies always have the latest technology.

name: Defiant Salvager
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: "I didn't survive that crash just so I could fall to the likes of you."

name: Feast of Succession
oracle_text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn. You become the monarch.
flavor_text:
"Beware the eager host."
—Eligeth, crossroads augur

name: Eyeblight Assassin
oracle_text: When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Boggart blood disgusts me almost as much as the foul creatures themselves."

name: Gilt-Leaf Winnower
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Gilt-Leaf Winnower enters the battlefield, you may destroy target non-Elf creature whose power and toughness aren't equal.

name: Miara, Thorn of the Glade
oracle_text:
Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor_text: "Approach from downwind. Tread with care. Aim for the heart."

name: Maalfeld Twins
oracle_text: When Maalfeld Twins dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"Who am I to break up a family?"
—Gisa the Mad

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text:
"No matter how busy my schedule gets, I always try to take time for that personal touch."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Pride of the Perfect
oracle_text: Elves you control get +2/+0.
flavor_text: Like moonglove's flowers, the greatest beauty often masks the greatest dangers.

name: Supernatural Stamina
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor_text:
"All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."
—Senifet, vizier of Bontu

name: Revenant
oracle_text:
Flying
Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Not again."
—Hans

name: Viscera Seer
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

name: Boarding Party
oracle_text:
Haste
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Burning Anger
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to any target."
flavor_text: "With rage as your forge, your hammer can smite anything."

name: Champion of the Flame
oracle_text:
Trample
Champion of the Flame gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.
flavor_text: Grand Warlord Radha's challengers are always defeated, but she rewards the most passionate with the Flame of Keld. After that, they burn for her.

name: Court of Ire
oracle_text:
When Court of Ire enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Court of Ire deals 2 damage to any target. If you're the monarch, it deals 7 damage to that player or permanent instead.
flavor_text: Hold your tongue, lest you burn it.

name: Crimson Fleet Commodore
oracle_text:
Trample
When Crimson Fleet Commodore enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor_text:
"Kindly steer your fleet clear of the waters west of Scrub Isle. It would be a shame to incinerate such exquisite maritime craftsmanship."
—Commodore Axurik, to Admiral Yelise

name: Explosion of Riches
oracle_text: Draw a card, then each other player may draw a card. Whenever a card is drawn this way, Explosion of Riches deals 5 damage to target opponent chosen at random from among your opponents.

name: Dragon Egg
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor_text: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

name: Fathom Fleet Swordjack
oracle_text:
Whenever Fathom Fleet Swordjack attacks, it deals damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Encore {5}{R} ({5}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

name: Fiery Cannonade
oracle_text: Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.
flavor_text: Wary of the ferocious dinosaurs, the Legion of Dusk built up the walls of their fort—just in time for the pirates to burn them down.

name: Frenzied Saddlebrute
oracle_text:
Haste
All creatures can attack your opponents and planeswalkers your opponents control as though those creatures had haste.
flavor_text: The drumbeats of the horde echo in every heart.

name: Impulsive Pilferer
oracle_text:
When Impulsive Pilferer dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Encore {3}{R} ({3}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

name: Goblin Trailblazer
oracle_text: Menace
flavor_text:
"Why are we following the goblin? Can he even read that map?"
—Daphne Vail, *Diremore* first mate

name: Lightning-Rig Crew
oracle_text:
{T}: Lightning-Rig Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, untap Lightning-Rig Crew.
flavor_text: A pirate ship in battle is a storm of activity.
